metadata.how_to_trigger: Press the release button (S_IRN_PrisonerGroup4_Lever_2624ef80-b02a-4ae7-ac1a-ed0072ec0038)  to release the hostage from the torture bed, which will free them and play the AD.

0.speaker: Santoria
0.text: Freedom... finally. My deepest thanks to you.

1.speaker: Santoria
1.text: I only hope I can make it out in time... My poor Skorv...
